resources.string: Clash of Clans is not installed

Just start the Shield and you will never be attacked!

• You can normally play CoC while Infinity Shield is active.
• You don\’t need to change any settings.
• You don\'t need rooted device.
• You don\’t eed o worry about getting raided :)

How it works?
Shield starts CoC periodically, which keeps it logged in. It does not modify the state of the game.
Simple? Yes! That\'s why it works!
